attributes.action: Partially refund tuition fees due to Covid-19 for international students.
attributes.additional_details: Due Covid-19 only online classes are taking place and students have paid the full fees. There is payment made for all facilities to be provided for student which is not even available.
attributes.background: Government should ask universities to partially refund fees. Fees which all are paying for and activities are not taking place.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Require universities to partially refund tuition fees for 20/21 due to Covid-19
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/324762

Require Universities to partially refund tuition fees for 19/20 due to Covid-19
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550738

Lower university tuition fees for students until online teaching ends
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552911
